question_stem.en: A 4-year-old boy is brought to the office for routine evaluation of a heart murmur. The patient has no fatigue, shortness of breath, or exercise intolerance. He has no other medical conditions and has had no surgeries. Vital signs are within normal limits. On examination, the patient has no cyanosis or clubbing of the fingers. There is a harsh, 3/6 holosystolic murmur best heard at the left lower sternal border. There are no rubs or gallops. Pulses are 2+ in the upper and lower extremities. Compared to an unaffected child, which of the following changes in oxygen saturation would be expected in this patient? {{exhibit_1}}
question_stem.zh: 一名4岁男孩因常规评估心脏杂音来到诊所。患者无疲劳、呼吸急促或运动耐受性差。他没有其他疾病，也没有接受过手术。生命体征在正常范围内。体格检查显示，患者无发绀或手指杵状指。在左下胸骨旁可听到响亮、3/6级的全收缩期杂音。无摩擦音或奔马律。四肢脉搏均为2+。与未受影响的儿童相比，该患者的血氧饱和度会出现以下哪些变化？{{exhibit_1}}

question.en: Compared to an unaffected child, which of the following changes in oxygen saturation would be expected in this patient?
question.zh: 与未受影响的儿童相比，该患者的血氧饱和度会出现以下哪些变化？

A.zh: 降低；升高；降低；降低；降低

B.zh: 升高；升高；降低；降低；降低

C.zh: 升高；升高；正常；正常；正常

D.zh: 正常；升高；正常；正常；正常

E.zh: 正常；正常；正常；降低；降低

summary.en:
This question tests knowledge of ventricular septal defect (VSD) and its effect on oxygen saturation in different heart chambers. A VSD causes left-to-right shunting, leading to increased oxygen saturation in the right ventricle due to the mixing of oxygenated blood from the left ventricle. The oxygen saturation in other chambers and systemic circulation remains relatively unchanged.

To solve this question, recognize the clinical presentation of a VSD (harsh holosystolic murmur at the left lower sternal border). Understand the pathophysiology of left-to-right shunting and its impact on oxygen saturation levels in the heart chambers. Eliminate options that suggest changes in oxygen saturation inconsistent with VSD physiology.
summary.zh:
本题测试对室间隔缺损（VSD）及其对不同心腔血氧饱和度的影响的知识。VSD会导致左向右分流，由于来自左心室的氧合血混合，导致右心室血氧饱和度升高。其他心腔和体循环中的血氧饱和度保持相对不变。

要解决这个问题，需要认识到VSD的临床表现（左下胸骨旁有响亮的全收缩期杂音）。了解左向右分流的病理生理学及其对心腔内血氧饱和度水平的影响。排除提示血氧饱和度变化与VSD生理学不一致的选项。

tags: Ventricular septal defect; VSD; Cardiology; Heart murmur; Oxygen saturation; Left-to-right shunt; Right ventricle; Holosystolic murmur
